### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Structure at position (41, -82)
Consists of a burner-mining-drill at position (41, -82) and two chests at positions (40.5, -83.5) and (41.5, -83.5) for storing coal.

### Inserter and Furnace Structure at position (39.5, -81.5)
Consists of a burner-inserter at position (39.5, -81.5) and a furnace at position (0, 0) for smelting.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory of the entity is not full before attempting to insert items.
- Check the warnings of the entity for any messages indicating a full inventory.

### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest is not empty before attempting to extract items.
- Check the warnings of the entity for any messages indicating an empty chest.

### Errors when using a furnace
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to use it.
- Check the warnings of the furnace for any messages indicating a lack of ingredients.

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
- Important variables:
  - `coal_chest`: a chest for storing coal.
  - `drill`: a burner-mining-drill for mining coal.
  - `inserter`: a burner-inserter for moving items.
  - `furnace`: a furnace for smelting.
